quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! First thing I need you to do is to move east. And then, make an attempt to go east. Then, move east. With that accomplished, travel south. With that over with, make an effort to travel south. If you can succeed at that, make an effort to go to the west. Then, travel north. Then, venture west. Next, move west. After that, make sure that the dresser within the bedchamber is closed. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You have walked into a bedchamber. Not the bedchamber you'd expect. No, this is a bedchamber.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a dresser![if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] Look over there! a recliner. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a recliner? [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the recliner.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Silly recliner, silly, empty, good for nothing recliner.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You arrive in a pantry. A normal kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can make out a coffer. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a rack. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the rack. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You make out a counter. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? The counter is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_2] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. A standard kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You're now in the playroom. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You see a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_3]On the bookshelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bookshelf.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
I just think it's great that you've just entered a washroom. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You see a bench. The bench is typical.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bench you see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty. You move on, clearly infuriated by your TextWorld experience.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a laundry place like it isn't some huge deal. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] basket in the room.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Now why would someone leave that there?[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The basket is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a shelf. [if there is something on the s_5]On the shelf you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You're now in the shower.

 You can see a cabinet.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a study. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bar. A typical one.

 You can make out a safe.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You smell an interesting smell, and follow it to a mantle. [if there is something on the s_6]On the mantle you can see [a list of things on the s_6]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a mantle in a room.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You're now in the spare room. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You are in a lounge. A typical kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 Were you looking for a couch? Because look over there, it's a couch. The couch is typical.[if there is something on the s_7] On the couch you make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. This always happens![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in a place we're calling a launderette. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've entered a sauna. You start to take note of what's in the room.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cellar. An usual one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can see a stand. The stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_8] On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] However, the stand, like an empty stand, has nothing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just moved into a studio. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] bureau, which looks usual, in the corner.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The bureau contains [a list of things in the c_5]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The bureau is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a closet.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You arrive in a parlor. A typical kind of place.

 You can make out a type S chest. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The type S chest contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The type S chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just walked into a recreation zone. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You make out a bed stand. [if there is something on the s_9]On the bed stand you can see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Wow! You're in a bedroom.

 You can see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker in the room.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] Oh, great. Here's a chest.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cuboid chest.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The cuboid chest contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The cuboid chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You are in a restroom. A normal one.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a table. [if there is something on the s_10]On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]The table appears to be empty. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: dresser
infos.desc: The dresser looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: coffer
infos.desc: The coffer looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The basket looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an profound round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to try to go east. After that, attempt to head east. With that accomplished, venture east. Once you succeed at that, attempt to head south. Next, try to take a trip south. Next, venture west. Following that, go to the north. And then, make an effort to move west. Then, make an effort to take a trip west. That done, close the dresser within the bedchamber. Alright, thanks!
